BixBeGone
// functionality The following features won\'t work correctly due to permissions being denied: Launching camera Error obtaining Camera permissions, please restart app to request again Notification panel Error obtaining Notification panel permissions, please restart app to request again Ringer mode changes Error obtaining ringer mode change permissions, please restart app to request again Enable BixBeGone\'s access to change Do Not Disturb status Grant READ_LOGS Permission
Please run the following command on your computer connected to your phone via ADB: \n\n adb -d shell pm grant com.rmathur.bixbegone android.permission.READ_LOGS \n\n The application will not function correctly without this permission.
I ran this command READ_LOGS permission not granted, you must restart the application/service after granting this permission. App List selected to launch on Bixby button press OK
